RingOfDestiny:FruitStall.NAME: FruitStall
DESCRIPTIONS: You walk on the city street with dim vision... NL Just as you pace forward, a shop completely out of proportion to the environment inside the tower emerges in the view ahead... NL You're curious about what other stores sell besides that Merchants.

"Welcome!" Said a maid who seemed to be the owner. NL "There are all kinds of food that can't be seen in the spire, but because the sales are so good, now there are only some leftovers"。 NL At this time, you can see that there is an attractive #y~Fruit~ #y~Cake~ hidden under the shelf. NL It seems that the maid is celebrating for someone. But the sweet smell it gives off is too tempting.
#yDelicious！@ NL When you are proud of your theft technology, you suddenly feel something terrible behind you. Looking back, I found nothing.
"Thank you for your patronage. Welcome to visit next time"
"Really? If you can Do you have #ystrawberries or #yother #yfruits ."
"Ah! It's my favorite strawberry" She seemed exceedingly happy.

RingOfDestiny:ForkInTheRoad.NAME: Fork In The Road
DESCRIPTIONS: NL NL A small, shiny, round object falls on the ground in front of you. You'll #yfeel #r@Scared@ just by looking at it
Once you touch it, the space around you is twisted into darkness, fog enveloping Void NL
